Details.Name: GreateFor
Details.Feature: Book with American Express Cards and enjoy attractive offers on hotels and flight bookings with ZUJI Singapore.
1.5% cashback on all spend with no cashback cap.
Up to 50% savings when dining at a wide selection of restaurants islandwide.

Details.Name: SmallPrint
Details.Feature: Cashback is only awarded if your account is in good standing and not overdue.

Feature.Name: Welcome Gifts
Feature.FeatureDetails: 1. 3% cashback on up to S$5,000 spend for the first six months AND 2. Fee waiver for the first year
Feature.FeatureRequire: 1. 3% cashback on all spend onboth main and supplementary cards in first 6 months. 2. During promotional period, cashback rate of 1.5% will not be applied in addition to cashback rate of 3%. 3. Purchases in excess of S$5,000 during promo period will earn cashback of 1.5% (standard rate).
